positive.review:
As a person who has been playing this game for 3 years, I enjoy the aspects of the game, but of course there is some problems with it.

Pros :
Lots of players from around the world to meet
A bunch of places and secrets to find
They have been adding more stuff that could be good for roleplay
Character customization is okay, lots of fashion to choose from
Used to be pretty P2W but has started to lean towards being F2P

Cons :
Still slightly P2W. It's hard to earn money. Even the furniture in the game is expensive.
The best fashion is locked behind a paywall
Gems are hard to earn without the plus subscription, unless you want to watch over 20+ ads to get around 50 gems a day.
Can't choose game resolution on PC unlike on mobile
Hacking has became a frequent problem, back then, hackers were rare

Other than these pros, this game is pretty solid and I do recommend trying it!

I didn't think a game I randomly stumbled upon one day would be so addicting but I find myself playing everyday and enjoying every aspect. Especially as a cozy gamer it's just scratching that itch for me.

I've played this game since the Beta came out on the phone, I don't have too many hours on steam currently but I  definitely have put quite a few on the phone version. It has its up and downs, the experience will absolutely be different for everyone. Its a huge mix of ages, I'm early 30s but you will definitely see the drama the kids chat about, which can easily be hidden thankfully. As other reviews have said, there is a ton to do in this game and I highly suggest you choose one activity and go from there.

As for money and gems, yes you can totally buy some but with everything to do in game you can super easily make both, getting cards, finishing achievements, events etc.

As for a few of the other reviews, if you're getting banned you're absolutely spamming chat or speaking around the filter. Another big ban hammer is when you use side programs to farm/fish/catch bugs...they will catch you lol and others will report you.

To the one reviewer who couldn't move their plants in the garden, its not the shovel you need, its the smaller version of it (which I can't remember at this time. starts with a t I believe? games down atm or I'd check)

It's just a chill game, you can either RP, socialize, fish, catch bugs, farming, decorating house etc.. 
If you are a type of person that like Animal crossing or in-general cozy games, maybe even role-playing. This might be the game for you. 
Mind you that this is a mobile game, but PC people have an advantage when it comes to some of the mini-games.

Perfect for relaxing. Escape from real life to virtual life, although the UI is a bit confusing because it feels like a phone-based game is being forced into a PC game, making the controls feel awkward.
Its a very fun game and you can enjoy it with friends, its rage bating and exiting at the same time so if your looking for something new this is the game for you
WOW,I FEEL GOOD! super fun game. great multiplayer, good minigames. great game.

I've been playing this game since day 1, to be honest the recent updates (from 2025) are awesome. If you have friends to play with it will be more fun, the game is more focused on roleplay and decoration / dressing up. Wish we could have more features but I definitely recommend!
Chill game! My wife made me play it. Spent most days fishing. I was too broke to buy her the engagement ring. 10/10. would recommend.
It is a cute game, with lots of outfits! Although it is pay-to-win, I recommend this for social people <3

So I randomly found this game from fishing tag, played it for a day nonstop and it was a blast. This is like social mmorpg but without fights. You can mine, fish, catch critters, farm crops, there are collection mechanic for everything, you can dress up your character in so many ways. Game is very generous for free players if you are willing to invest your time. Also store items are rather cheap, I got cool costume and 7 days of premium only for 2 dollars! The only downside that there are hackers who instantly teleport to critters and stones. Oh, also in 12 hours I chatted like 3 times only, so if you are looking for more social game this is not the best option. Overall 7/10. I don't remember when I played so much time in 1 day, so give it a try!

this game is good but it has some issues from starting it up but managing to get it on but sometimes it won't boot up but it is still a good game even if that i say no to recommending this game it could use some fixes and updates and so on (Update have got the game working now and yet it looks very good for a game on steam and it has a version on phones too so somewhat and or someway maybe play it or don't idc)

been playing TS since 2021 lol, it was today when i  realised ts game is also available in STEAM.
anyways TS not bad at all imo. but can be frustrating if ure an android user during arcade cuz they favour IOS users more.
either way u can make sum gay ass homies too. i met a girl here and then we dated IRL over 2 years lmaoo. so ye be gay and enjoy TS

It's so cuteeeee! Mostly just get on here to fish and decorate my house but it's an addicting game.
It's cute, chill. fun to roam around. Can play with friends.
Enjoyable and still have challenges such as monster fish, beware of being addicted
Best game to hangout and chill with your friends.
Very good, very fun and relax
spawning in plaza to see the most horrendous thing being spammed in chat. 10/10
Good relax game to play with friends
I think this game should be nominated to win because its so chill
good game, i play this game from 2022 and play this game on my phone hehe...

My best friend had recommended this to me and what I didn't know is that we would be logging on every single day spending countless hours together fishing and just hanging out together on it relaxing, we have raised 5 children together and send them off to do work, this virtual world is great, I think it's fairly easy to earn gems I would say when you are first starting out it can be a little confusing but by day I think we are on 17 we've got everything pretty much down but we learnt a lot of what we needed to in the first week. Thank you Mao for showing me this and being able to spend so many hours with you on it, I've had a blast and we're gonna keep having a blast

Everything is fun when you’re with your friends and this game proved it once again! Had an absolute blast roasting that one friend in our group who thought buying all the DLCs right from the start was a cool move. also we wasted his playtime by more than 2hrs before leaving xD

As a person who has been playing this game for 3 years, I enjoy the aspects of the game, but of course there is some problems with it.

Pros :
Lots of players from around the world to meet
A bunch of places and secrets to find
They have been adding more stuff that could be good for roleplay
Character customization is okay, lots of fashion to choose from
Used to be pretty P2W but has started to lean towards being F2P

Cons :
Still slightly P2W. It's hard to earn money. Even the furniture in the game is expensive.
The best fashion is locked behind a paywall
Gems are hard to earn without the plus subscription, unless you want to watch over 20+ ads to get around 50 gems a day.
Can't choose game resolution on PC unlike on mobile
Hacking has became a frequent problem, back then, hackers were rare

Other than these pros, this game is pretty solid and I do recommend trying it!
I love the game. It’s like Animal Crossing meets Palia with a little mix of Roblox. Only downside is that the controls are WASD for movement and arrows for camera movement.
It's a fun game to play, there are a bunch of kids if you aren't comfortable with that.
idk whats the problem with this game.. other games run fine.. youtube video runs fine.. but this game always shows no internet connection, i dont understand.

I didn't think a game I randomly stumbled upon one day would be so addicting but I find myself playing everyday and enjoying every aspect. Especially as a cozy gamer it's just scratching that itch for me.

I've played this game since the Beta came out on the phone, I don't have too many hours on steam currently but I  definitely have put quite a few on the phone version. It has its up and downs, the experience will absolutely be different for everyone. Its a huge mix of ages, I'm early 30s but you will definitely see the drama the kids chat about, which can easily be hidden thankfully. As other reviews have said, there is a ton to do in this game and I highly suggest you choose one activity and go from there.

As for money and gems, yes you can totally buy some but with everything to do in game you can super easily make both, getting cards, finishing achievements, events etc.

As for a few of the other reviews, if you're getting banned you're absolutely spamming chat or speaking around the filter. Another big ban hammer is when you use side programs to farm/fish/catch bugs...they will catch you lol and others will report you.

To the one reviewer who couldn't move their plants in the garden, its not the shovel you need, its the smaller version of it (which I can't remember at this time. starts with a t I believe? games down atm or I'd check)

It's just a chill game, you can either RP, socialize, fish, catch bugs, farming, decorating house etc.. 
If you are a type of person that like Animal crossing or in-general cozy games, maybe even role-playing. This might be the game for you. 
Mind you that this is a mobile game, but PC people have an advantage when it comes to some of the mini-games.

This is a cozy game.

Lemme address some issues. 
This game is marketed towards kids, but sometimes weirdos spam inappropriate stuff in chat, most of them being newer players. Some people also put 18-21+ in their profile pic, which is weird. They only come by once in maybe several days in the Plaza. Probably been reported but I don't know. Am a little worried about hidden condo houses. 
Also, weddings are real. I will not find a lesbian nor do I want one just for the wedding perks.
Hackers are everywhere. They often look into their phone (animation) before teleporting to a nearby boulder to mine or event enemy to fight with an overpowered weapon won with Gacha. PVE and mining events are a haven to hackers because they teleport (do not buy the event currency for the coin stack. I have tried to get a cool looking jacket and I have failed ;-;).

Key note, I report these weirdos and block them but there are too many to count. Even the richest players are hackers. 
Lastly, some of the minigames are copied from popular games, some of them being Roblox. Tower of Hell from Roblox? Nah we got Tower of Infinity. Fall Guys? We have Game Party. 

Other than that, it's a pretty chill game. 
The title "Play Together" is a suggestion lol. Clubs are mostly there for cards sadly, but parties have RP :D. 
It can be grindy to get furniture for a large house, vehicles for traveling, and other things. 
I like the animal crossing mechanics as well as the quests and school. While some quests feel like a sell-out, they are all worth it in the end because they are fetch quests. The school is hard to get A+ on report card, but fun.
 Minigames, while copies of original games, are still OK as long as you have the patience to wait for other players to join you. I personally like the fashion show minigame cause it has less people and you can buy VIP with gems. Plus, doing parkour games is easy as long as you get the right timing for jumping (it's like once you take a jump, it's a decision you'll either like or don't like depending on if you get bounced by a wall ;-;). I don't like the infected minigame or the battlegrounds minigame. The infected minigame feels like a closed POV even though its a prop hunt, and the battlegrounds minigame is easy to spend too many tickets just by learning it. 
Events can either be a letdown or easy. Fishing events are nice and relaxed. Gathering events are somewhat stressful but somewhat fair. 
I would still recommend this game to others as something to play once in a while to decompress. Just keep in mind that this is a free to play game with a LOT of microtransactions (mostly outfits or cheat items for minigames and currency items).
 Do not gamble for outfits lol. I'd recommend some of the outfit sets that don't involve in-currency gems because 1) some look epic such as the zodiac outfits and 2) Gambling sucks. 

So overall, good. Don't recommend to kids or gamblers. Will still play.

Perfect for relaxing. Escape from real life to virtual life, although the UI is a bit confusing because it feels like a phone-based game is being forced into a PC game, making the controls feel awkward.

Play Together is basically a virtual world where you can do everything except pay rent in real life. Want to fish, catch bugs, dig up fossils, or throw epic home parties with friends from around the globe? You got it. Customize your avatar until they look like a fashion icon, collect pets that are cuter than you deserve, and compete in minigames that somehow make losing feel hilarious. It’s chaos, friendship, and absurd fun all rolled into one. 10/10, I’ve never had so much social anxiety while fishing.

I have been playing this game for almost 5 years now and I'm still absolutely addicted!! I play every single day and I'm never bored. There's always something to do! You can earn level achievements, dress up your character with hundreds of clothing items to chose from, make friends, take pictures and videos, drive tons of different vehicles- including skateboards, bikes, boats, helicopters, and sports cars. You can also fish, catch bugs, mine, craft items, farm, host parties, raise pets, raise minime's (babies) collect cute keychain toys, play mini games alone or together with a group, watch YouTube videos together in your house, attend play school, collect name titles, roleplay, and MUCH MORE.. and that's all without paying a cent! I also didn't even mention the in depth story based events released every 2 weeks! You can earn currency, outfits, vehicles, pets, and tons more!! If you enjoy cozy games like Animal Crossing, Roblox, and/or Sims than PLAY TOGETHER is 100% a must try!
Its a very fun game and you can enjoy it with friends, its rage bating and exiting at the same time so if your looking for something new this is the game for you
WOW,I FEEL GOOD! super fun game. great multiplayer, good minigames. great game.

this game is good but it has some issues from starting it up but managing to get it on but sometimes it won't boot up but it is still a good game even if that i say no to recommending this game it could use some fixes and updates and so on (Update have got the game working now and yet it looks very good for a game on steam and it has a version on phones too so somewhat and or someway maybe play it or don't idc)
lots of cute outfits, great simple social game
Its a very cute, entertaining game, I really enjoy trying to finish all the quests

Did spend way too much time on this game. Definitely a cute game.
Though I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone who would waste too much money on in-game items and currency since it could get addicting.

This game is quite good and the rewards from the event are very good, I can say that this game is quite good for F2P. For P2W players, this game is also very good, the items are very interesting and cute.

I like virtual world/world simulation games; the ones where you can customize everything like you can in sims. I came across this game and decided to give it a go. I'm glad I did because this game is just an all around relaxing and wholesome game. It gives you a ton of free stuff and money every day so those who don't spend money on games don't have to. You don't have to log in every day to keep up with some stupid streak, you can log in whenever and unless it's an event, everything stays the same daily reward wise. The quests are cute and you have arrows to tell you where to go so you're not wandering around lost. I'm not sure about how making friends is because I like playing games like this on my own, but it seems like if you want to make friends there are plenty of nice people that play that would be good game buddies. I have yet to come across trolling creeps so thats another pro about this game. I suggest playing this game if you're into cozy games that don't require a lot of brain power to play.

negative.review:
Low gacha rate. Low fishing rate. Demand players to spend so much time and effort only to get something little.
Worst social game ever. I have been playing this game since 2022 on mobile and this greedy company won't change a thing about the low rate settings. 

Here is the tips : 
DO NOT SPEND ANY MONEY TO THE GAME OR YOUR GAME ACCOUNT WILL HAVE LOWER GACHA RATES.
This is true. I have compared my three accounts and the non-paying account always have good gacha result.

Absolute trash game. Play Together is a scam game from Korean company. Not worth playing this game.

Cash grab game. The only thing the devs know is overpicing low-quality tools ad slapping the aurora label on every cash grab item. This is not a multiplayer social game. This is a pay-to-collect dress-up game.

ADVERTENCIA: RIESGO DE BANEADO SI SOLICITAS UN REEMBOLSO DE GOOGLE POR UNA COMPRA ERRÓNEA. ¡NO INVIERTAS DINERO EN ESTE JUEGO. HAEGIN Co., Ltd. Y Google LLC TE ESTAFAN!
He invertido mucho dinero en este juego. Un día, después de realizar por error una compra en la tienda de Play Together, solicité un reembolso a Google. La solicitud fue aceptada y se emitió el reembolso. Inmediatamente después, Haegin bloqueó permanentemente mi cuenta con la motivación “Refund policy violation”.
Contacté con Google, pero me respondieron que no podían intervenir.
 Me parece inaceptable que un usuario sea baneado de un juego presente en su plataforma solo por haber solicitado y recibido un reembolso legítimo por un error de compra. Google protege a los desarrolladores, no a los consumidores. Esta práctica es injusta y perjudicial.
¡NO INVIERTAS DINERO EN ESTE JUEGO. HAEGIN Co., Ltd. Y Google LLC TE ESTAFAN!

—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

تنبيه: خطر الحظر إذا طلبت استرداد من Google بسبب شراء خاطئ. لا تستثمروا أموالكم في هذه اللعبة. HAEGIN Co., Ltd. و Google LLC يخدعونكم!
لقد استثمرت الكثير من المال في هذه اللعبة. في يوم من الأيام، بعد أن قمت عن طريق الخطأ بعملية شراء في متجر Play Together، طلبت استرداد الأموال من Google. تم قبول الطلب وتم إصدار الاسترداد. فور ذلك، قامت Haegin بحظر حسابي نهائيًا مع السبب “Refund policy violation”.
تواصلت مع Google، لكنهم أجابوا بأنهم لا يستطيعون التدخل.
 أجد أنه من غير المقبول أن يتم حظر مستخدم من لعبة موجودة على منصتهم لمجرد طلبه واستلامه استردادًا مشروعًا عن شراء خاطئ. Google تحمي المطورين وليس المستهلكين. هذه الممارسة غير عادلة وتضر بالمستخدمين.
لا تستثمروا أموالكم في هذه اللعبة. HAEGIN Co., Ltd. و Google LLC يخدعونكم!

Well first let me give this some pros and cons:
PROS:
- Graphic is decent nice, it's cute if i want to give it a perfect word to describe.
- Events are fun, I pretty like the design and creative this game has to offer.
- Good community, I can add many friends and reach out.
- Assets or Items are well made. Beautiful fishes and pets.

CONS:
- Terrible rate chance (like it's so hard to get a rare item from grinding. Ex: I spent nearly a week to get a blue diamond or even more if I'm not lucky because all I know about this game is base on luck, the hit chance won't do much)
- Fishing is crazily bored right now, I have a really good fishing rod (it's VIP, VVIP) and guess what no big fish shadow for over 1-2 hours like who are you kidding man? Are you want people enjoy the game by wasting thier time?
- Pay to Win is just eating your wallet, like i said this game is base on luck not chance rate. You get things by luck, this game's system is so broken. Grinding is pain in the ass, I love grinding, get a VVIP by own hand not moneny and guess what can't even get a rare fish? Like it's taking sooo longg man, your VVIP fishing rod has 100% probability to see or catch a rare fish. I know that "probability" means but dude why you have to be a ♥♥♥♥♥ to make those 100% soooo ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ hard to see one big shadow fish bruh?
- Hackers and cheats, commonly ♥♥♥♥ but still annoying me as ♥♥♥♥!

CONLUSION: The game would be great if they low down the chance rate geting items man. I'm 20+ years old, this game would killing my time so much for just fishing and wait to get just ONE rare fish. I mean the game will earn some young players, kids, they would like the game but for me, pain in the ass because i hate the lucky system.

I’m a new player who has deposited around $600 into this game over the last 14 days. Recently, my account was locked for unusual activity, even though I play on Steam and occasionally fish on my phone. I don’t understand how they are treating their customers.

Low gacha rate. Low fishing rate. Demand players to spend so much time and effort only to get something little.
Worst social game ever. I have been playing this game since 2022 on mobile and this greedy company won't change a thing about the low rate settings. 

Here is the tips : 
DO NOT SPEND ANY MONEY TO THE GAME OR YOUR GAME ACCOUNT WILL HAVE LOWER GACHA RATES.
This is true. I have compared my three accounts and the non-paying account always have good gacha result.

Absolute trash game. Play Together is a scam game from Korean company. Not worth playing this game.

This feels like a roblox game with how many in-game purchases there are, and how there's an overwhelming amount of activities to do. All of the cute customizable options (hair, faces, clothes, etc) are either locked behind a paywall that requires real-life money or is just too expensive for the measely amount of cash you make in-game [i] (why is a shirt 4,000 in-game dollars when I'm only earning a couple hundred bucks per sale? or less per achievement?) [/i] That's not even getting into how the game floods you with gifts and rewards for the first day or so, getting you used to recieving all these gifts and currency only to lock it behind a subscription. Diabolical.

In short, way too much going on and I don't really feel like I get to choose what to do- I'm either grinding for funds to spend on stuff I actually want, or I'm running around trying to fulfill what my avatar or their pet/child wants to do. There also doesn't appear to be a way to organize the crops at your housing plot once you plant them. They gave me a sapling shovel, but it doesn't work on any of the fully grown crops- which is really unfortunate.

This review is a bit mixed because even though I do recommend it, I also do NOT recommend it. Why? Because even though this is a fun f2p game that has a vibe to animal crossing (without the villagers being animals) and also having the ability to socialize, the "f2p" aspect is very much a term you can use loosely. Play Together has events that change quite often, are very fast paced and if you are not one to heavily farm, you WILL fall behind. If you do not pay for certain items in events, like a fishing event having a new fishing pole with stats that help on specific event, you will have a hard time farming. The majority of events have a certain fishing pole, a gun, or an insect net to use and they are very specific to the event being put out.

Another note on these stats is that you can better the items with certain coins that the game offers you, but when you see probabilities on getting an S rank (being the best), you will see a 0.0445%. These things are to be considered if you are a person that loves to rush farm, like myself, or if you'd rather take it easy. Basically, it is up to the user to see how you want to play this game.

For Cons, yes, the items are pretty cheap when it comes to clothes in comparison to other games where you can and will buy skins for over $20. The thing is, it really adds up so save the money for certain clothes you'd like. There are themed draws and you will waste a lot of gems, the thing with these gems is that the game gives you so little for free and its a gacha: probability might not be in your favor. There is a certain type of "pity" (for genshin players) and it can take up to 100-200 throws for specific draws, just to keep in consideration. The game also offers you tickets for draws but they are a little harder to farm out from gems, its on personal experience since other players might have more luck then I do.

Even though I am a huge fan of this game and I do consider it to be fun, I do want to be transparent that for the majority of events it is Pay To Win instead of the f2p aspect. I do wish that some packages of clothing could be available for gems for those that cannot waste the money (especially the children) to have the liberty of dressing their avatars a little more nice. I do confess that the clothes that the game offers for stars (the currency in-game) is terrible. I hope one day that this game can have more liberty. 

The most important part that I can elaborate is that: PLEASE DO NOT ASK FOR A REFUND BEFORE CONTACTING CUSTOMER SUPPORT FOR THE GAME, YOU WILL GET YOUR ACCOUNT PERMABANNED.
and also please make sure to never share your account with someone that will not be in your life for a long time, not even if they offer to buy you a skin, because the security for this game is not the best. They cannot and will not close the session of another player that is logged in on any device in your account and there has been instances of players getting hacked and/or having their items recycled (deleted, because you cannot sell items, only recycle). Please take the security a little more serious and do not give access to players that are NOT your close friends irl.

If anything else that is important and I forgot, I will edit. SORRY FOR THE LONG REVIEW.

Cash grab game. The only thing the devs know is overpicing low-quality tools ad slapping the aurora label on every cash grab item. This is not a multiplayer social game. This is a pay-to-collect dress-up game.

the amount of stuff for shop like pets items and stuff the pay to win is annoying feels like MORE money hungry version of animal jam i dont like or love it bad game for the amount of items are for pay to win parents dont let you kid play this cuz youll be asked to buy lots of things for them because they "NEED" it plz too many pay to win items and pets And currency in shop dont download edit: greedy devs

this game is so bad with the tutorial and also not to mention shit is so bright for no fucking reason, mostly ment for little kids at this point ,but my main concern is how fucking loud that shit is when you start the game.
it pay to win and its fun wen you have the membersihps but then wen you dont have them you can bearly do anithing
Boring mobile app game which has a ton of micro transaction and not worth playing f2p. waste of time.
The dumbest tutorial ever , and very long . Extreme pay to win garbage . Boring game play , 0 story , graphics are just terrible .
Idk game si boring and DLC cost more than Deltarune so i don't think anyone smart will spend money on it and its more like Random Roblox Rip Off

Force me to click through 200 tutorial menus before I can get my bearings, and with a billion mouse sensitivity because no settings or options beforehand? No thanks fucking cringe.
Downvoted + Refunded, TRASH.
This game would have slapped if it came out 10+ years ago for gay kids on consoles.
Also, the privacy policy and ToS pages were blank when I clicked on them to read them, Not based.
so many things on my screen lol and extremely boring to play
Always prompting to verify identity.
Cant even enjoy this shit blackout drunk
crash game

This is true. I have compared my three accounts and the non-paying account always have good gacha result.

Absolute trash game. Play Together is a scam game from Korean company. Not worth playing this game.

This feels like a roblox game with how many in-game purchases there are, and how there's an overwhelming amount of activities to do. All of the cute customizable options (hair, faces, clothes, etc) are either locked behind a paywall that requires real-life money or is just too expensive for the measely amount of cash you make in-game [i] (why is a shirt 4,000 in-game dollars when I'm only earning a couple hundred bucks per sale? or less per achievement?) [/i] That's not even getting into how the game floods you with gifts and rewards for the first day or so, getting you used to recieving all these gifts and currency only to lock it behind a subscription. Diabolical.

In short, way too much going on and I don't really feel like I get to choose what to do- I'm either grinding for funds to spend on stuff I actually want, or I'm running around trying to fulfill what my avatar or their pet/child wants to do. There also doesn't appear to be a way to organize the crops at your housing plot once you plant them. They gave me a sapling shovel, but it doesn't work on any of the fully grown crops- which is really unfortunate.

This review is a bit mixed because even though I do recommend it, I also do NOT recommend it. Why? Because even though this is a fun f2p game that has a vibe to animal crossing (without the villagers being animals) and also having the ability to socialize, the "f2p" aspect is very much a term you can use loosely. Play Together has events that change quite often, are very fast paced and if you are not one to heavily farm, you WILL fall behind. If you do not pay for certain items in events, like a fishing event having a new fishing pole with stats that help on specific event, you will have a hard time farming. The majority of events have a certain fishing pole, a gun, or an insect net to use and they are very specific to the event being put out.

Another note on these stats is that you can better the items with certain coins that the game offers you, but when you see probabilities on getting an S rank (being the best), you will see a 0.0445%. These things are to be considered if you are a person that loves to rush farm, like myself, or if you'd rather take it easy. Basically, it is up to the user to see how you want to play this game.

For Cons, yes, the items are pretty cheap when it comes to clothes in comparison to other games where you can and will buy skins for over $20. The thing is, it really adds up so save the money for certain clothes you'd like. There are themed draws and you will waste a lot of gems, the thing with these gems is that the game gives you so little for free and its a gacha: probability might not be in your favor. There is a certain type of "pity" (for genshin players) and it can take up to 100-200 throws for specific draws, just to keep in consideration. The game also offers you tickets for draws but they are a little harder to farm out from gems, its on personal experience since other players might have more luck then I do.

Even though I am a huge fan of this game and I do consider it to be fun, I do want to be transparent that for the majority of events it is Pay To Win instead of the f2p aspect. I do wish that some packages of clothing could be available for gems for those that cannot waste the money (especially the children) to have the liberty of dressing their avatars a little more nice. I do confess that the clothes that the game offers for stars (the currency in-game) is terrible. I hope one day that this game can have more liberty. 

The most important part that I can elaborate is that: PLEASE DO NOT ASK FOR A REFUND BEFORE CONTACTING CUSTOMER SUPPORT FOR THE GAME, YOU WILL GET YOUR ACCOUNT PERMABANNED.
and also please make sure to never share your account with someone that will not be in your life for a long time, not even if they offer to buy you a skin, because the security for this game is not the best. They cannot and will not close the session of another player that is logged in on any device in your account and there has been instances of players getting hacked and/or having their items recycled (deleted, because you cannot sell items, only recycle). Please take the security a little more serious and do not give access to players that are NOT your close friends irl.

If anything else that is important and I forgot, I will edit. SORRY FOR THE LONG REVIEW.

Cash grab game. The only thing the devs know is overpicing low-quality tools ad slapping the aurora label on every cash grab item. This is not a multiplayer social game. This is a pay-to-collect dress-up game.

Well first let me give this some pros and cons:
PROS:
- Graphic is decent nice, it's cute if i want to give it a perfect word to describe.
- Events are fun, I pretty like the design and creative this game has to offer.
- Good community, I can add many friends and reach out.
- Assets or Items are well made. Beautiful fishes and pets.

CONS:
- Terrible rate chance (like it's so hard to get a rare item from grinding. Ex: I spent nearly a week to get a blue diamond or even more if I'm not lucky because all I know about this game is base on luck, the hit chance won't do much)
- Fishing is crazily bored right now, I have a really good fishing rod (it's VIP, VVIP) and guess what no big fish shadow for over 1-2 hours like who are you kidding man? Are you want people enjoy the game by wasting thier time?
- Pay to Win is just eating your wallet, like i said this game is base on luck not chance rate. You get things by luck, this game's system is so broken. Grinding is pain in the ass, I love grinding, get a VVIP by own hand not moneny and guess what can't even get a rare fish? Like it's taking sooo longg man, your VVIP fishing rod has 100% probability to see or catch a rare fish. I know that "probability" means but dude why you have to be a ♥♥♥♥♥ to make those 100% soooo ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ hard to see one big shadow fish bruh?
- Hackers and cheats, commonly ♥♥♥♥ but still annoying me as ♥♥♥♥!

CONLUSION: The game would be great if they low down the chance rate geting items man. I'm 20+ years old, this game would killing my time so much for just fishing and wait to get just ONE rare fish. I mean the game will earn some young players, kids, they would like the game but for me, pain in the ass because i hate the lucky system.

I’m a new player who has deposited around $600 into this game over the last 14 days. Recently, my account was locked for unusual activity, even though I play on Steam and occasionally fish on my phone. I don’t understand how they are treating their customers.

Low gacha rate. Low fishing rate. Demand players to spend so much time and effort only to get something little.
Worst social game ever. I have been playing this game since 2022 on mobile and this greedy company won't change a thing about the low rate settings.
